Description.Text: The pool is currently closed for renovations. We apologize for the inconvenience.

The new Hilton Garden Inn Calgary Downtown hotel is set in trendy East Village, just steps from Calgary's business district, city agencies and beautiful urban parks. Take the RiverWalk pathway to restaurants, playgrounds and event plazas, and discover the popular St. Patrick's Island. Scotiabank Saddledome and the National Music Centre are just 1 kilometer away.

Settle into a guest room with modern touches like wood floors, granite countertops and an ergonomic workspace. A microwave, mini-refrigerator, Keurig coffeemaker, 47-inch TV and complimentary WiFi access provide the comforts of home. Choose a corner room for fantastic views of the East Village through floor- to-ceiling windows. Accessible rooms with audio/strobe alerts and lowered amenities are also available.

You'll find plenty of downtown Calgary dining options at the hotel. Enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner at our restaurant and bar, or order off the room service menu. The Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for any snack and drink cravings.

RoomType.text: 2 Queen Beds...comp Wifi- Hdtvs With Hi

Message.Text: Important notices: In case of any amendment please contact us to check the rates and conditions as these could change - Hotel will invoice the total amount of this booking in case of no show / En caso de modificacion, por favor contacten con nosotros para verificar las tarifas y condiciones de la reserva ya que podrian ser diferentes - En caso de no show el hotel se reserva el derecho de aplicar gastos del 100%
